# lightingEnvironment

**Instance Property**

A cube map texture that depicts the environment surrounding the scene’s contents, used for advanced lighting effects.

## Declaration

```swift
var lightingEnvironment: SCNMaterialProperty { get }
```

## Discussion

When rendering materials with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNMaterial/LightingModel-swift.struct/physicallyBased] lighting model, SceneKit illuminates surfaces differently according to the environment that surrounds them. For example, with physically based shading, even a diffuse surface takes on some color from the sky above it and the ground below it.



For information about defining cube maps, see the discussion of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNMaterialProperty/contents] property.

## Accessing Scene Contents

- **rootNode**: The root node of the scene graph.
- **background**: A background to be rendered before the rest of the scene.
